title: Bring Back The Old Summoner's Rift Design
body:
Since its Leagues 10th birthday I think it would be a nice idea to bring back the old summoner's rift design as a  additional graphics option.

Who doesn't want to bring back old memories from the good old days?

Since it is optional, everyone can keep their beloved new update. Not that the current Design is bad or anything, but I would like to feel this nastolgia.

Since Riot is working on a lot of things that do not neccessarily impact the major gameplay I don't think that this is impossible.

Cheers

replies.body: Schreib doch im deutschen Forum vielleicht besser Deutsch. ;)
